name: Bestagon
description:
In the kingdom of Zaigarde, rests the source of infinite power, the Bestagon.

A dragon named Kurse stole the Bestagon to fulfil his evil demands. Before anyone could do something, he split it into 6 Triangons and hid it in an unknown place.

Now, a brave warrior has determined to find the Bestagon and bring peace. Join his journey in this GamBoy metroidvania in an unknown place filled with illusions.

Controls for Web version:

  • Up - Up Arrow / W
  • Down - Down Arrow / S 
  • Left - Left Arrow / A 
  • Right - Right Arrow / D 
  • A - Alt / Z / J
  • B - Ctrl / K / X 
  • Start - Enter 
  • Select - Shift

This game is made with GBStudio 2.0 for both Web and GameBoy itself.

To play this game, you can use the Web version on this site  or you can download the ROM and play it on any Game Boy emulator or flash cartridge.

Credits:

  • Code, Sprites, Box art: Rising Retro
  • Music and fonts: GBStudio Community Assets
  • Tileset: OpenGameArt.org

Game Screenshots are taken on VBA-M emulator in GameBoy colour mode.
